alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 17 at 1:45PM EST until December 18 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 5 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (10.6 to 11.7 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA County. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/02 PM 10.2/10.7 0.7/ 1.1 0.1/ 0.6 3 None 18/03 AM 9.4/ 9.9 -0.2/ 0.3 0.5/ 1.0 5-8 None 18/03 PM 11.5/12.0 2.0/ 2.5 1.8/ 2.2 15-16 Minor 19/04 AM 8.6/ 9.1 -1.0/-0.5 -0.5/ 0.0 9-11 None Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 4.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/03 PM 9.3/ 9.8 -0.2/ 0.2 0.2/ 0.7 2-3 None 18/03 AM 8.5/ 9.0 -1.1/-0.6 0.5/ 1.0 4-8 None 18/04 PM 10.4/10.9 0.9/ 1.4 1.5/ 2.0 14-15 None 19/04 AM 7.8/ 8.4 -1.7/-1.2 -0.3/ 0.2 9-11 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
